plot: Claire can't forget the beautiful stranger she let get away after three New Year's Eves spent together, on the fourth New Year's Eve she is alone and as the bells ring in the New Year she runs into the street seeking the man of her dreams.
title: "Red Shoe Diaries" Midnight Bells
plot_es: Claire can't forget the beautiful stranger she let get away after three New Year's Eves spent together, on the fourth New Year's Eve she is alone and as the bells ring in the New Year she runs into the street seeking the man of her dreams.
plot_en: Claire can't forget the beautiful stranger she let get away after three New Year's Eves spent together, on the fourth New Year's Eve she is alone and as the bells ring in the New Year she runs into the street seeking the man of her dreams.
